sum_bart: ECS Biztech Limited.   Regd. Ofﬁce: The First, B02, ECS Corporate House, Behind Keshavbaug Party Plot, Off. 132                 ft Ring Road, Vastrapur, Ahmedabad - 380015. India.
sum_peg: Dear Sir and Madam,ursuant to Regulation 7(3) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that on 10th April, 2025 the shares of ECS Corporation Limited were transferred to Purva Shastrapur Limited as per Regulation 7(3) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.
